title.jp: That kind of fairy-tale for example

synopsis: DJ Condor is your guide as the everyday lives of several young city-dwellers come into focus on the streets of Yanagihara, a bustling metropolis where there's no shortage of stories.

title.jp: My favourite animal is the pegasus

synopsis: Chronically under-employed Hayato Narita is hired to help a young girl -- the sister of a local gang leader -- find her stolen bicycle. Meanwhile, Shusuke Chitose is tasked with reviewing the autobiography of an ex-porn star.
After arriving for his first shift at Karuo's Alexander, Shusuke learns he'll be trained by Hiyoko. Later, when the YFB rumbles with R-Wing, Hayato finds himself in the middle of the action.

title.jp: Dora......... I think I might be pregnant at the moment......

synopsis: Ai and Naru create a few awkward situations while competing for Hayato's attention. Meanwhile, some truly unusual events unfold at Alexander involving Kakeru, Shusuke, and a bizarre -- and violent -- customer.

title.jp: Oh, thee exalted virtues of Count Bork!

synopsis: Takashi may have trouble grasping the various conditions that go along with "dating" Asuka, but that's nothing compared to facing ten thousand monsters on the field of battle!

title.jp: Yikes! No way, they'll hear us!

synopsis: Chitose gets an eyeful when a grateful Hiyoko tenderly dresses his wound. Later, Drac warns Otori about a dangerous man in a hat.

Garuda, the King of Gretagard, seizes control of Takashi's body and reunites with his old friend Phoenix. When the king's lusty desires lead him to Kobato, familial relations get creepy with a quickness!

title.jp: Is the Big-Breasted Gal with Cream Still Not Here Yet!

synopsis: When Lord Hawk is pierced by a poisoned blade, Sparrow uses her body as a tool to help him expel the venom. Back at school, Takashi gets caught in a tug-of-war between a bossy blonde and a Watarai.
Shusuke assumes control of Takashi for the day, Hiyoko hears some heartbreaking criticism of her latest literary effort, and Naru recruits some friends to help find her missing bicycle!

Hayato quickly handles the all-important grad essay situation, but when he gets caught in an awkward situation with a couple of young girls, he gives way to Shusuke, who manages to save Hiyoko's writing career!

title.jp: Are You Familiar with Imouto Moe?

synopsis: Haneda's day out features a slightly creepy conversation on the forbidden secrets of little sister moe, and Watarai gets physical when her boyfriend disappears into his dreamland!
As Haneda slowly lets go of his fantasy world, he discovers the reason for his very existence and reaches out to those who helped him along the way.
